abilities.desc: Whenever you give Tokens to an enemy, you heal 1. This Ability cannot heal you more than the Bleed Value in a single turn.
abilities.trigger: whenever you give tokens to an enemy

abilities.desc: Your Actions and Abilities are Unblockable by Shields.

actions.name: Block This
actions.desc:
An enemy within range gains 1 Iron token, then you deal 4 damage to them. Unblockable by Iron Tokens.
Usable once per turn.

actions.name: Heart Strike
actions.desc:
An enemy within range pays 2 HP and gains 1 Weakness token.
7+: That enemy pays 2 more HP and gains 2 Weakness tokens.
